original: intros K V b a l H1 H2. intros H3 H4. unfold is_series in *. unfold filterlim in *. unfold locally in *. unfold locally_norm in *. unfold ball_norm in *. intros eps Heps. destruct (H2 l eps Heps) as [N HN]. exists N. intros n Hn. rewrite <- (H3 n), <- (H4 n). apply HN. apply Hn. apply Hn.
